Description: Green glazed composition shabti of (Ta)sheret(enta)ihet with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard, crossed hands in relief holding an incised hoe, an adze and the string of the seed-bag which hangs over the shoulder, the front of the leg section is inscribed with incised hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
